last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 13
last_episode_to_air.overview: Comics include Vince Morris and David Cross.

name: Shorties Watchin' Shorties
overview:
Shorties Watchin' Shorties was a television show broadcast on Comedy Central that is now on DVD. The show is made up of various short animated clips with audio from comedians' stand up routines. It also features two "shorties," a pair of babies voiced by Nick DiPaolo and Patrice O'Neal who watch and comment upon the routines on TV. For many of the episodes, the babies only stayed in the house, but in later episodes, they were shown walking around the city.

The show featured comedians such as Dane Cook, Bill Burr, Brian Regan, Brian Posehn, Chris Hardwick, Mitch Hedberg, Mike Birbiglia, Jim Gaffigan and Lewis Black.

The animation was scripted and produced at World Famous Pictures and Augenblick Studios. The show was not renewed but full episodes are available on DVD. Clips from the show are posted on the Comedy Central website as well as on Hulu and Netflix. 14 episodes were produced and 13 aired.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Comics: Dane Cook, Denis Leary, Janeane Garofalo, Jeffrey Ross, Brian Regan, Jonathan Corbett, Gilbert Gottfried, Richard Jeni, Elon Gold, Joey Vega, Jay Mohr tell their stand-up stories on the series opener.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Nick and Patrice talk about sex, babies on airplanes, and Nick talks about his future in the mob. Comics: Dane Cook, Denis Leary, Adam Ferrara, Dwayne Kennedy, Brian Regan, Jim Short, Robert Hawkins, Bill Burr, Sue Murphy, Paul Nardizzi, Laura Kightlinger, Warren Hutcherson.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Nick and Patrice discuss hunting, being baptized, and just what their babysitter is doing in the back room. Comics: Bobcat Goldthwait, Lewis Black, Richard Jeni, Gregg Rogell, Joe Yannetty, Russ Meneve, Bobby Collins, Ted Alexandro, Adam Ferrara, Tim Young, Tracy Smith.
